row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SMOKE_WEB.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_ST_KEY_VALUE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_ST_KEY_VALUE#, '"', '\"') :SET &UC4RB_ST_EXPECTED_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_ST_EXPECTED_TEXT#, '"', '\"')
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#smoke-web-tool.jar" websmoketest PostSearchText -url "&UC4RB_ST_URL#" -kv "&UC4RB_ST_KEY_VALUE#" -et "&UC4RB_ST_EXPECTED_TEXT#" -re &UC4RB_ST_TREAT_AS_REGEX# -u "&UC4RB_ST_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_ST_PASSWORD#" -t "&UC4RB_ST_OPEN_TIMEOUT#" -ic &UC4RB_ST_IGNORE_SERVER_CERT# -ph "&UC4RB_ST_PROXY_HOSTNAME#" -pp "&UC4RB_ST_PROXY_HOST_PORT#" -pu "&UC4RB_ST_PROXY_USERNAME#" -ppwd "&UC4RB_ST_PROXY_PASSWORD#"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
